column4: hi ya'll system:win7/11.10b2, 64bit messed up /etc/grub.d/05_debian_theme, now update-grub hangs.. how can i reinstall it? if i delete it, will the system regenerate it? hehe
you can reconfigure grub-common or grub-pc depending on which version of grub you have installed
pls dont qry me. we can talk here
